text: The Dautreuil House, at 517 E. Bridge St. in St. Martinville, Louisiana, was built around 1840. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1995. It is a one-story brick house, with brick laid in common bond, with Creole and Greek Revival influences. With It has been operated as the La Maison Louie Bed and Breakfast. ==References== Category:National Register of Historic Places in St. Martin Parish, Louisiana Category:Greek Revival architecture in Louisiana Category:Buildings and structures completed in 1840
title: Dautreuil House
